pages.text: This charm is a more powerful variation of the $(l:constructs/charms/polynesia_charm)Polynesia Charm$(/l). If has all the properties of the latter, but when held, $(l:creatures/demon)Demons$(/l) will be significantly less likely to attack.

pages.title: Demon Trading
pages.text: Demons that adopt a non-hostile behaviour against the charm's user will also be inclined to trade with them. When bargaining, a Demon is likely to reduce its prices. Regardless of price, the charm gets damaged each time the player trades with a Demon, and when the charm breaks, there are no guarantees that the Demon will remain docile.
